review: I love my fire stick, its all i use now.
author: Kevin

review: I absolutely love the fire-stick. I had chrome-cast for a while but the fire-stick just has so many options and it also runs so smooth which makes everything look really good.
author: Robert

review: Perfect for travel! I didn't notice any difference in the stick and the fore TV except...size and weight!
author: Kindle Customer

review: Works reliably. Excellent programming. Only have one complaint. I was watching Netflix and it was free. The next day they want  money for Netflix. I wouldn't mind so much, but other methods to access Netflix are still free.
author: Robert A. Hatcher "hatcherb"

review: Definitely needed the extended added, once that was done worked and still Works perfect!
author: Sami L

review: The Fire stick is ok...however it needs to be plugged in to a power source. This is difficult if there is a wall mounted TV and no convenient power outlet nearby.So you have the wire going everywhere.
author: ravishankar narayanan

review: Love it so much, I bought another, then bought one for a friend.  I recommend the game controller.  It just makes sense with all the game options available.
author: Dayraymathuews
